document_data.name: Centiv Naomal
document_data.mainbody: '''Centiv Naomal''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] specializing in [[illusion]]s in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Centiv was the son of [[Khondar Naomal]], the guildmaster of the [[Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors]].
document_data.Description: Centiv had chestnut hair and a full beard.
document_data.Personality: Centiv tried hard to impress his father but his father didn't respect his abilities.<ref>
document_data.History:
Centiv resided with his father in [[Sundabar]] for a time before coming to [[Waterdeep]] around [[1459 DR]].

Centiv helped his father kill [[Samark Dhanzscul]], the sixth [[Blackstaff]], and kidnap his heir [[Vajra Safahr]] in [[Marpenoth]] of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}. Centiv assumed the illusory form of Samark and was able to convince everyone he encountered that he was the Blackstaff.

When Khondar and Centiv attempted to break into [[Blackstaff Tower]] together, the pair were trapped but Khondar escaped, abandoning Centiv to his fate. Centiv remained trapped inside the tower, left to  be tormented (and perhaps killed) by the spirits of the tower.<ref>
